# Overview
The overall descriptive epidemiology plots presented in this manuscript are from data pooled across individual studies. Results are presented in 3 or 6 months intervals and estimates are for cumulative incidence, incidence proportion, incidence rate, prevalence, as well as persistent wasting, weight-for-length z-score (WLZ), mean length-for-age z-score (LAZ) and mean weight-for-age z-score (WAZ).

The descriptive statistics tables ...
